description:
Serving a diverse range of clients throughout Carroll County, Arkansas, and the surrounding areas of the Ozarks, the attorneys at the Sprott, Golden & Bardwell law firm in Berryville provide unmatched legal counsel and support to clients who have complex, pressing legal issues involving any of the following:

  • Personal injury
  • Estate planning and probate
  • Real estate law
  • Family law and divorce
  • Criminal defense
  • Corporate law and contracts
  • Creditors' rights
  • Municipal law
  • General civil litigation

Regarded as one of our region's leading full-service legal practices, we have two additional law offices in Harrison and Clinton to provide convenient access to the quality, personalized counsel you need for virtually any legal challenge you may face. Lending further credence to our success, we have earned the 10 Best in Client Satisfaction for Estate Planning Award from the American Institute of Legal Counsel. We have also received many other accolades from our peers along with glowing reviews and referrals from our satisfied clients.

How have we achieved this level of success? We always keep our clients' needs at the forefront of our efforts. We also strive to deliver highly personalized representation and customized solutions aimed at helping our clients resolve their legal issues and obtain the favorable outcomes they seek as efficiently and cost-effectively as possible.

For more information on how we can best assist you and help you protect yourself, your family and your business, we invite you to contact Sprott, Golden & Bardwell by phone or through our law firm's website to schedule a free initial consultation.
